original_text: For, said Hushai, thou knowest thy father and his men, that they be mighty men, and they be chafed in their minds, as a bear robbed of her whelps in the field: and thy father is a man of war, and will not lodge with the people.
korean_text: 또 후새가 말하되 왕도 아시거니와 왕의 아버지와 그의 추종자들은 용사라 그들은 들에 있는 곰이 새끼를 빼앗긴 것 같이 격분하였고 왕의 부친은 전쟁에 익숙한 사람인즉 백성과 함께 자지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: thou knowest thy father and his men
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 아버지와 그의 사람들을 앎이라

sentences.original_text: and they be chafed in their minds
as a bear robbed of her whelps in field
and thy father is a man of war
and will not lodge with people
